verses.roman:
ācāryaratna, āra paṇḍita vakreśvara
ācāryanidhi, āra paṇḍita gadādhara

synonyms: ācāryaratna—Ācāryaratna; āra—and; paṇḍita vakreśvara—Vakreśvara Paṇḍita; ācāryanidhi—Ācāryanidhi; āra—also; paṇḍita gadādhara—Gadādhara Paṇḍita.
translation: Ācāryaratna, Vakreśvara Paṇḍita, Ācāryanidhi and Gadādhara Paṇḍita were all very much pleased to hear this news.
